cs.ualberta.CMPUT301F14T08.stackunderflow.managers

Class CachedPostManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs.ualberta.CMPUT301F14T08.stackunderflow.managers.PostManager
      • cs.ualberta.CMPUT301F14T08.stackunderflow.managers.CachedPostManager

  • public class CachedPostManager
extends PostManager
    CachedPostManager manages anything a user enters when they are offline. Also only post manager uses one of these to hold posts sendToFile allows for local saving of posts that can be pushed later to online to a Gson file on their device loadToFile allows for users to load all local data that they already have saved inside their Gson file on their device toggleUpove changes the upvote status from that user in the local cache
    Author:
    Cmput301 Winter 2014 Group 8

      • loadFromFile

        public java.util.ArrayList<Post> loadFromFile()
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Load posts from file using GSON
        Returns:
        Posts a Array List of Posts that the device pulls from a local gson file from the device. Will return a blank list if there is no gson file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a error preventing the gson file from being loaded.
